snippet: A suicide bomber and two security officers were among those killed at a Saudi-Yemeni border crossing on Friday.
abstract: At least six people, including suicide bomber and two security officers, are killed at Saudi-Yemeni border crossing in attacks that highlighted threat posed by militants to security of both nations; gunmen are believed to be Al Qaeda militants.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber and two security officers were among those killed at a Saudi-Yemeni border crossing on Friday.

headline.main: Yemen: At Least 6 Die After Saudi Border Post Is Attacked
